name: Llama v2 70B Chat
description: Llama v2 70B Chat, developed by Meta, is an auto-regressive language model that uses an optimized transformer architecture. It's a 70B parameters finetuned Chat model version using supervised fine-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning with human feedback (RLHF) to align to human preferences for helpfulness and safety. It's released under a custom commercial license.
